Make a request for the WHO API v2

Source: R/request_token.R
make_request.Rd

Builds a request to the url using the token obtained from the get_token() function.

Usage

make_request(url, token, language = "en", auto_update = TRUE, req_body = NULL)

Arguments

url

(character) Address for the request

token

(list) Access token to the API obtained from get_token()

language

(character) Language for the request. Available languages are listed in https://icd.who.int/docs/icd-api/SupportedClassifications/ the default is English (language = "en").

auto_update

Attempts to update token automatically

Value

An httr2 request for the API

Examples

if (exists("CLIENT_ID") & exists("CLIENT_SECRET")) {
  #Generated token
  token <- get_token(CLIENT_ID, CLIENT_SECRET)

  res <- make_request(
      url = 'https://id.who.int/icd/release/10/E14.1',
      token = token,
  )
  #Use that request with the API:
  res |> req_perform()
 }
#> <httr2_response>
#> GET https://id.who.int/icd/release/10/E14.1
#> Status: 200 OK
#> Content-Type: application/json
#> Body: In memory (464 bytes)
